item.description:
Welcome to the New Haven Collective's Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

10/10/2011's location will be:

Wicked Wolf

We'll have the following specials:

All night: $5 for a half-yard draft beer.  And, 50 cent wings.

6pm-8pm (get wristband from Event host):

$3 for drafts; well & call drinks; house wines

To help pay for the cost of running the New Haven Collective Meetup, at this Event we'll be asking for donations from attendees (but not if this is your first Event with us!).  $1, $5, whatever you can give.

For Happy Hour Events if you're only a "Maybe", please put a comment in your RSVP.

HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP (texting is fine too)

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host, plus we're most likely the largest group at the bar on a Monday.
item.name: Mon. 10/10 - Happy Hour on Columbus Day - Wicked Wolf
